segments.text: excuse me , could you tell me which line I ’ m supposed to stand in to buy bubble wrap and to post a package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you can buy the bubble wrap here , but you ’ ll have to stand in line over here to post your passage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s a really long line . How long do you think it ’ ll take to get through all those people ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it takes about 3 minutes per person , so it ’ ll probably be about an hour ’ s wait .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure . How many would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need 30 for my Christmas cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: twenty of them are going abroad to China and America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you have any going anywhere in the EU ? If you do , those are less expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , here you go . That will be 18 pounds and seventy two pence .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thanks a lot . You ’ Ve been very helpful .
segments.speaker: S1
